name: parsoid
description: A bidirectional runtime wikitext parser. Converts back and forth between wikitext and HTML/XML DOM with RDFa.

scripts.lint: npm run dump-tokenizer && npm run eslint
scripts.eslint: eslint bin lib tests tools core-upgrade.js
scripts.eslint-fix: eslint --fix bin lib tests tools core-upgrade.js
scripts.dump-tokenizer: npm run dump-tokenizer-source && npm run dump-tokenizer-rules
scripts.roundtrip: node bin/roundtrip-test.js -c --domain en.wikipedia.org 'Barack Obama' && node bin/roundtrip-test.js -c --domain fr.wikipedia.org Chope && node bin/roundtrip-test.js -c --domain en.wikipedia.org --xml Parkour && node bin/roundtrip-test.js -c --domain www.mediawiki.org --oldid 2170316 'User:Legoktm/test_this_is_json'
scripts.test: npm run nsp && npm run lint && npm run parserTests && npm run parserTests-nobatch && npm run mocha
scripts.cover-roundtrip: istanbul cover bin/roundtrip-test.js --dir ./coverage/roundtrip1 -- -c --domain en.wikipedia.org 'Barack Obama' && istanbul cover bin/roundtrip-test.js --dir ./coverage/roundtrip2 -- -c --domain fr.wikipedia.org Chope && istanbul cover bin/roundtrip-test.js --dir ./coverage/roundtrip3 -- -c --domain en.wikipedia.org --xml Parkour && istanbul cover bin/roundtrip-test.js --dir ./coverage/roundtrip4 -- -c --domain www.mediawiki.org --oldid 2170316 'User:Legoktm/test_this_is_json'
scripts.coverage: npm run cover-mocha && npm run cover-parserTests && npm run cover-roundtrip && istanbul report
scripts.nsp: echo 'nsp has been shut down but npm audit requires npm >= 6'
